description:
The scope of the 2009 Demographic and Health Survey includes:
- Household: age, sex, relationship to the head of the household, characteristics of the household dwelling, such as the water source; type of toilet facilities; materials used for the roof, floors, and walls; possession of durable goods.
- Women and Men: education, residential history and media exposure, pregnancy history and childhood mortality, knowledge and use of family planning methods, fertility preferences, antenatal, delivery and postnatal care, breastfeeding and infant feeding practices, immunisation and childhood illnesses, marriage and sexual activity, their own work and their husbandâ€™s background characteristics, and awareness and behaviour regarding HIV and other STIs.
keywords: breastfeeding, child-mortality, demographic, dhs, family-planning, fertility, health, immunisation, infant, kiribati, malaria, maternity, nutrition, sexual-life, sti, tuberculosis
name: Kiribati Demographic and Health Survey 2009
